# Divination (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* | [[Istus]], Kirith Sotheril |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** You cast divination spells at +2 caster levels.

**Divination Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Identify (Spell)|Identify]]****:** Gives +10 bonus to identify magic items.

**2** **[[Augury (Spell)|Augury]]** **<sup>MF</sup>:** Learns whether an action will be good or bad.

**3** **[[Divination (Spell)|Divination]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Provides useful advice for specific proposed actions.

**4** **[[Scrying (Spell)|Scrying]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Spies on subject from a distance.

**5** **[[Commune with Greater Spirit (Spell)|Commune with Greater Spirit]]** **<sup>MX</sup>:** Any spirit creature answers one question/level.

**6** **[[Legend Lore (Spell)|Legend Lore]]** **<sup>MF</sup>:** Lets you learn tales about a person, place, or thing.

**7** **[[Scrying, Greater (Spell)|Scrying, Greater]]****:** As *[[Scrying (Spell)|scrying]]*, but faster and longer.

**8** **[[Discern Location (Spell)|Discern Location]]****:** Reveals exact location of creature or object.

**9** **[[Foresight (Spell)|Foresight]]****:** “Sixth sense” warns of impending danger.


-tx-
|---|---|
| **Source:** | Oriental Adventures (WotC), pg. 86 |
